home.paragraph3: I'm helping startups and business owners to make a visual statement through spotless Web Design and Development so they can increase brand awareness and revenue.

privatePolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privatePolicy.text:
1. General Information

This policy applies to the website operating at: jeremikarp.com
The operator of the website and the administrator of personal data is: Jeremi Karp
Contact email: jeremikarp@gmail.com
The operator is the administrator of your personal data with respect to data voluntarily provided on the website.
The website uses personal data for the following purposes: handling inquiries via the contact form.
The website collects information about users and their behavior as follows: through voluntarily entered data in forms, which is stored in the operator’s systems, and through storing cookies on user devices.

2. Selected Data Protection Methods

Login and data entry areas are protected by transmission layer security (SSL certificate). Thanks to this, personal data and login data entered on the site are encrypted on the user’s computer and can be read only on the target server.
The operator periodically changes administrative passwords.
An important part of data protection is the regular update of all software used by the operator to process personal data, in particular regular updates of programming components.

3. Hosting

The website is hosted (technically maintained) on servers of another company.
The hosting company ensures technical reliability by keeping server logs. These logs may include: requested resources, request arrival time, response time, client station name, error information, referrer URL, browser information, IP address, diagnostics related to ordering services, and email handling.

4. Your Rights and Additional Information

The administrator may transfer your personal data to other recipients if necessary to perform an agreement with you or fulfill legal obligations. This applies to such groups: authorized employees and collaborators, hosting provider, mailing and SMS providers, marketing partners, couriers, insurers, law firms, banks, payment operators, and public authorities.
Your personal data is processed no longer than necessary. Marketing data will not be processed for more than 3 years.
You have the right to request: access to your data, rectification, deletion, restriction of processing, and data portability. You also have the right to object to processing for marketing purposes.
You can lodge a complaint with the President of the Personal Data Protection Office.
Providing personal data is voluntary but necessary to use the website.
Personal data is not transferred outside the European Union.

5. Information in Forms

The website collects information voluntarily provided by users, including personal data, if provided.
The website may store information about connection parameters (time, IP address).
Data provided in forms is processed for purposes resulting from the function of a specific form, e.g., service requests, business contact, service registration.

6. Administrator Logs

Information about user behavior in the website may be logged. This data is used to administer the website.

7. Important Marketing Techniques

The operator uses statistical traffic analysis via Google Analytics (Google Inc., USA). Data is anonymized and based on cookies. Users can edit their ad preferences at: https://www.google.com/ads/preferences/

8. Cookies Information

The website uses cookies. Cookies are IT data stored on the user’s device, intended for use with the website. Cookies may be session or persistent.
Users may change cookie settings in their browser. Restrictions on cookies may affect some website functionalities.
Cookies may also be used by cooperating entities, in particular Google, Facebook, Twitter.

9. Cookie Management

Users can change cookie settings at any time in their browser. Instructions are available in the documentation of individual browsers and mobile devices..

aboutMe.desc: Hi! My name is Jeremi, and I am passionate about new technologies and creating online projects. I enjoy developing my skills, taking on challenges, and learning new things. In my free time, I focus on photography, programming, and cooking, as well as pursuing various creative projects. I am a curious, open-minded person who is always ready to take action.

portfolioProjects.studio01description: A photo shoot in a studio. Some of the photos were taken for Philocaly.
portfolioProjects.warsaw01description: A photo shoot in Warsaw. Few people and some architecture.
portfolioProjects.jeremikarpdescription: My personal portfolio website, now in a new version with updated technology.

steps.ConsultationDesc: We get to know your needs and goals.
steps.PlanningDesc: We create a project plan and site structure.
steps.DevelopmentDesc: Building the website and technology integrations.

techDesc.HTML: Markup language for structuring web pages.
techDesc.CSS: Stylesheet language for designing web pages.
techDesc.Sass: CSS preprocessor for nested and maintainable styles.
techDesc.JavaScript: High-level programming language for web development.
techDesc.TypeScript: Superset of JavaScript adding static typing.
techDesc.NextJs: React framework for server-side rendering and fullstack apps.
techDesc.Tailwind CSS: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.
techDesc.PHP: Backend language used for web development and server-side logic.
techDesc.SQL: Structured Query Language for relational databases.
techDesc.ExpressJs: Web framework for Node.js to build APIs quickly.
techDesc.Supabase: Open-source Firebase alternative with Postgres database.
techDesc.Vercel: Deployment and hosting platform for frontend apps.
techDesc.Cloudflare: CDN and security platform for web apps.
techDesc.GitHub: Platform for hosting and collaborating on Git repositories.
techDesc.ESLint: Tool for identifying and reporting on code issues.
techDesc.Prettier: Code formatter for consistent code style.

faq.Question1: What technologies do you use most often?
faq.Answer1: I mostly work with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase. This allows me to build fast and scalable applications.
faq.Question2: How long does it take to complete a project?
faq.Answer2: Simple websites can be done in a few days, while more complex applications may take several weeks — it all depends on the scope.
faq.Question3: What does the collaboration process look like?
faq.Answer3: First, I discuss the requirements, then I prepare a plan and design, next I handle coding and deployment. Finally, I provide testing and support.
faq.Question4: Do you handle SEO and performance optimization?
faq.Answer4: Yes, I make sure that websites are fast, well-rated in Lighthouse, and optimized for SEO.
faq.Question5: Do you help with hosting and deployment?
faq.Answer5: Of course — I can advise on hosting options, configure the server, and deploy the website to production.
